WorkletSharedStorage.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The WorkletSharedStorage interface of the {{domxref("Shared Storage API", "Shared Storage API", "", "nocode")}} represents the shared storage for a particular origin within a worklet context.

WorkletSharedStorageContext.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The context read-only property of the interface contains contextual data passed into the shared storage worklet from the associated browsing context via the method.
WorkletSharedStorageContext.value: A string representing the data. The value will match the latest value that was passed into the method prior to navigation to the . If no value was set by setSharedStorageContext() prior to navigation, then context will return undefined.

WorkletSharedStorageEntries.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The entries() method of the
interface returns an async iterator. The iterator provides an array of [key, value] pairs corresponding to the enumerable properties of a WorkletSharedStorage instance. The order of these pairs is similar to that in a for...in loop, though a for...in loop also enumerates properties from the prototype chain.
WorkletSharedStorageEntries.returns: An array of the WorkletSharedStorage's enumerable property key-value pairs.

WorkletSharedStorageGet.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The get() method of the
interface retrieves a value from shared storage.

remarks.para:
-Shared Storage API
-Noise and scaling on privacysandbox.google.com (2023)

WorkletSharedStorageGet.returns: A that fulfills with either a string equal to the value of the retrieved key-value pair or undefined if the specified key is not found in the shared storage.

WorkletSharedStorageKeys.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The keys() method of the
interface returns an async iterator, which contains the keys for each item in a WorkletSharedStorage instance.
WorkletSharedStorageKeys.returns: An array of the WorkletSharedStorage's enumerable property keys.

WorkletSharedStorageLength.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The length() method of the
interface returns the number of entries currently stored in shared storage for the current origin.
WorkletSharedStorageLength.returns: A that fulfills with a number, which represents the total count of key-value pairs currently in the shared storage.

WorkletSharedStorageRemainingBudget.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The remainingBudget() method of the
interface returns the remaining navigation budget for the current origin.

remarks.para: The navigation budget is the number of entropy bits permitted inside a {{htmlelement("fencedframe")}} due to the calls per origin every 24 hours. This is not the same as the number of navigations; rather, it is based on the number of potential navigations in each call. Each time a selectURL() navigation occurs, the corresponding origin's budget decreases by the logarithm (base 2) of the number of URL choices.
Navigation budget is a mechanism designed to limit the rate of leakage of cross-site data to the destination pages navigated to in fenced frames.

WorkletSharedStorageRemainingBudget.returns: A that fulfills with a number representing the remaining navigation budget.
